item.title: SCHNITZER STEEL INDUSTRIES INC 10-K
item.description: SCHNITZER STEEL INDUSTRIES INC, which is in the Wholesale-Misc Durable Goods [5090] industry, SEC 10-K filing on October 24, 2022 had 43504 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: 2022 - 533 instances company - 491 instances steel - 427 instances financial - 290 instances fiscal - 288 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here.
